description: This json file contains the corrections for the deepJet, particleNet, robustParticleTransformer AK4 jet taggers for the 2023_Summer23BPix campaign. Working points for the tagging algorithms are also supplied in this file (wp_values).

corrections.name: deepJet_wp_values
corrections.description: Working points values of the b-jet discrimination for deepJet in 2023_Summer23BPix. The L/M/T/XT/XXT working points correspond to 10/1/0.1/0.05/0.01% light jet-misidentification rates.

output.name: wp
output.description: Working point value of the b-jet discriminator

corrections.name: particleNet_wp_values
corrections.description: Working points values of the b-jet discrimination for particleNet in 2023_Summer23BPix. The L/M/T/XT/XXT working points correspond to 10/1/0.1/0.05/0.01% light jet-misidentification rates.

output.name: wp
output.description: Working point value of the b-jet discriminator

corrections.name: robustParticleTransformer_wp_values
corrections.description: Working points values of the b-jet discrimination for robustParticleTransformer in 2023_Summer23BPix. The L/M/T/XT/XXT working points correspond to 10/1/0.1/0.05/0.01% light jet-misidentification rates.

output.name: wp
output.description: Working point value of the b-jet discriminator
